title: @KateyKhaos
body:
Since we're paying attention to the PROJECT Skins can we do something about PROJECT: Yasuo

It's a great skin but I can't use it simply because it's animations are too fucked up compared to High Noon/Classic mainly being the AA animation and Q

Like can we just get rid of those and use base animations? I don't want to be at a disadvantage using a skin I enjoy
